languages.text: "Что? Как..." {n}Пыточник скрючивается, его начинает бить крупная дрожь, которую он уже не пытается скрыть.{/n} "Как я мог удержаться... чистая, незамутненная эссенция... страдание в чистом виде..." {n}Голос друкари скатывается в неразборчивое шипение — и он срывается с места.{/n}

"What? How did you..." {n}The torturer hunches his shoulders and begins to shake violently, no longer trying to hide it.{/n} "How could I resist? Pure, unadulterated essence... An extract of true torment..." {n}The Drukhari's voice deteriorates into unintelligible hissing before he turns and scurries away.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Что? Как..." {n}Пыточник скрючивается, его начинает бить крупная дрожь, которую он уже не пытается скрыть.{/n} "Как я мог удержаться... чистая, незамутненная эссенция... страдание в чистом виде..." {n}Голос друкари скатывается в неразборчивое шипение — и он срывается с места.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "What? How did you..." {n}The torturer hunches his shoulders and begins to shake violently, no longer trying to hide it.{/n} "How could I resist? Pure, refined essence... An extract of true torment..." {n}The Drukhari's voice deteriorates into unintelligible hissing before he turns and scrambles away.{/n}

An extract of true torment..." {n}The Drukhari's voice deteriorates into unintelligible hissing before he turns and scrambles away.{/n}

An extract of true torment..." {n}The Drukhari's voice deteriorates into unintelligible hissing before he turns and scurries away.{/n}

"What? How did you..." {n}The torturer hunches his shoulders and begins to shake violently, no longer trying to hide it.{/n} "How could I resist? Pure, unadulterated essence... An extract of true torment..." {n}The Drukhari's voice deteriorates into unintelligible hissing before he turns and scurries away.{/n}

languages.text: 「なに？いったいどうして…」{n}拷問官は肩をすくめ、激しく震え始め、もはや隠そうとさえしない。{/n}「抵抗できるわけがない。純粋で洗練されたエッセンス…真の苦悩のエキスを…」{n}デュカーリの声が意味不明なシューシューという音に変わったかと思うと、身を翻して逃げ出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? How did you..." {n}The torturer hunches his shoulders and begins to shake violently, no longer trying to hide it.{/n} "How could I resist? Pure, unadulterated essence... An extract of true torment..." {n}The Drukhari's voice deteriorates into unintelligible hissing before he turns and scurries away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なに？いったいどうして…」{n}拷問官は肩をすくめ、激しく震え始め、もはや隠そうとさえしない。{/n}「抵抗できるわけがない。純粋で洗練されたエッセンス…真の苦悩のエキスを…」{n}デュカーリの声が意味不明なシューシューという音に変わったかと思うと、身を翻して逃げ出した。{/n}

languages.text: “什么？你到底是怎么……”{n}行刑者弓起身子，剧烈地颤抖着，不再试图隐藏自己的恐惧。{/n}“可我怎么能抗拒得了？这纯粹、洁净的精华……这才是真正的痛苦……”{n}黑暗灵族的声音变成了无法理解的嘶嘶声，随后转身逃走了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? How did you..." {n}The torturer hunches his shoulders and begins to shake violently, no longer trying to hide it.{/n} "How could I resist? Pure, unadulterated essence... An extract of true torment..." {n}The Drukhari's voice deteriorates into unintelligible hissing before he turns and scurries away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “什么？你到底是怎么……”{n}行刑者弓起身子，剧烈地颤抖着，不再试图隐藏自己的恐惧。{/n}“可我怎么能抗拒得了？这纯粹、精致的精华……这才是真正的痛苦……”{n}黑暗灵族的声音变成了无法理解的嘶嘶声，随后转身逃走了。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Qué? ¿Cómo has...?». {n}El torturador encorva los hombros y empieza a temblar violentamente, abandonando todo intento de ocultarlo.{/n} «¿Cómo podría resistirme? Esencia pura sin adulterar... Un extracto del verdadero tormento...». {n}La voz del Drukhari se convierte en un siseo ininteligible antes de darse la vuelta y escabullirse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? How did you..." {n}The torturer hunches his shoulders and begins to shake violently, no longer trying to hide it.{/n} "How could I resist? Pure, unadulterated essence... An extract of true torment..." {n}The Drukhari's voice deteriorates into unintelligible hissing before he turns and scurries away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué? ¿Cómo has...?». {n}El torturador encorva los hombros y empieza a temblar violentamente, abandonando todo intento de ocultarlo.{/n} «¿Cómo podría resistirme? Esencia pura y refinada... Un extracto del verdadero tormento...». {n}La voz del Drukhari se convierte en un siseo ininteligible antes de darse la vuelta y alejarse corriendo.{/n}

languages.text: "Was? Wie seid Ihr ...?" {n}Der Folterknecht krümmt die Schultern und beginnt wild zu beben, er versucht nicht länger, es zu verbergen.{/n} "Wie konnte ich da widerstehen? Reine, unverfälschte Essenz ... Ein Extrakt wahrer Pein ..." {n}Die Stimme des Drukhari verkommt zu einem unverständlichen Zischen, bevor er sich umdreht und hastig wegläuft.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? How did you..." {n}The torturer hunches his shoulders and begins to shake violently, no longer trying to hide it.{/n} "How could I resist? Pure, unadulterated essence... An extract of true torment..." {n}The Drukhari's voice deteriorates into unintelligible hissing before he turns and scurries away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was? Wie seid Ihr ...?" {n}Der Folterknecht krümmt die Schultern und beginnt wild zu beben, er versucht nicht länger, es zu verbergen.{/n} "Wie konnte ich da widerstehen? Reine, veredelte Essenz ... Ein Extrakt wahrer Pein ..." {n}Die Stimme des Drukhari verkommt zu einem unverständlichen Zischen, bevor er sich umdreht und davonhuscht.{/n}

languages.text: « Quoi ? Comment avez-vous... » {n}Le tortionnaire rentre la tête dans les épaules et se met à trembler violemment, sans plus chercher à le dissimuler.{/n} « Comment résister ? De l'essence brute... Un extrait de tourment pur... » {n}La voix du Drukhari faiblit jusqu'à n'être plus qu'un sifflement inintelligible. Soudain, il se détourne et prend ses jambes à son cou.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? How did you..." {n}The torturer hunches his shoulders and begins to shake violently, no longer trying to hide it.{/n} "How could I resist? Pure, unadulterated essence... An extract of true torment..." {n}The Drukhari's voice deteriorates into unintelligible hissing before he turns and scurries away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? Comment avez-vous... » {n}Le tortionnaire rentre la tête dans les épaules et se met à trembler violemment, sans plus chercher à le dissimuler.{/n} « Comment résister ? De l'essence raffinée... Un extrait de tourment pur... » {n}La voix du Drukhari faiblit jusqu'à ne plus devenir qu'un sifflement inintelligible. Soudain, il se détourne et prend ses jambes à son cou.{/n}

languages.text: "Ne? Bunu nasıl..." {n}İşkenceci kamburunu çıkarıp şiddetle titremeye başlıyor; artık kendini tutmaya çalışmıyor.{/n} "Direnmek elde mi? Saf, katıksız öz... Gerçek işkence özütü..." {n}Drukharinin sesi anlaşılmaz tıslamalara dönüştükten sonra, arkasını dönüp hızla kaçıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? How did you..." {n}The torturer hunches his shoulders and begins to shake violently, no longer trying to hide it.{/n} "How could I resist? Pure, unadulterated essence... An extract of true torment..." {n}The Drukhari's voice deteriorates into unintelligible hissing before he turns and scurries away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Bunu nasıl..." {n}İşkenceci kamburunu çıkarıp şiddetle titremeye başlıyor; artık kendini tutmaya çalışmıyor.{/n} "Direnmek elde mi? Saf, katıksız öz... Gerçek işkence özütü..." {n}Drukharinin sesi anlaşılmaz tıslamalara dönüştükten sonra, arkasını dönüp hızla kaçıyor.{/n}
